question:
7. AGA : Vino, can you help me fix my computer?    VINO: I'd love to, but today my schedule is full. What about tomorrow?
From the conversation, we know that ...
A. Vino cannot help Aga.
C. Vino refuses to help Aga.
B. Vino will fix Aga's computer today D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jawabannya adalah D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow

Jawaban:

D. Vino will fix Aga's coputer tomorrow

Thanyou <3

Jawaban:

A rhyme is a repetition of similar sounds (usually, exactly the same sound) in the final stressed syllables and any following syllables of two or more words. Rhyming words have different beginning sounds, but have the same vowel and ending sounds, for example: cat/sat/pat/hat, spin/fin/chin/pin, etc.

Penjelasan:

Hope this helps sorry if I'm wrong.

Make it the smartest yes ;).

related_questions.question:
Sajikan data berikut dalam bentuk diagram batang!    Kelas Jumlah Siswa
 I 35
 II 20
 III 45
 IV 40
 V 30
 VI 25​

CAUTION    LIVE, CHILDREN PLAYING

 What does the above caution mean?
A.	Children are playing games around the place.
B.	Children are not allowed to play around the area.
C.	It is the place for children to play around here.
D.	You have to be careful because children are playing there.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. You have to be careful because children are playing there.

Semoga benar dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

Jawaban:

D you have to be careaful because children are playing there

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

we went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

past tense jd v2

Jawaban:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

Past tense merupakan kata yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan kejadian yang telah terjadi di masa lampau.

Perbedaannya dengan present tense adalah verb yang digunakan.

Present tense menggunakan verb 1, dan past tense menggunakan verb 2.

Maka verb 2 dari go adalah:

go → went

Past Tense Sentences:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

related_questions.question:
Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw

related_questions.question:
Buatlah kalimat berikut present perfect tensse

1. She (meet) him.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

She has met him

Penjelasan:

Present perfect tense dipakai untuk menyatakan perbuatan atau situasi yang dimulai di masa lampau dan sudah selesai atau masih terjadi atau masih ada hubungannya dengan masa sekarang. Contoh : I have been a teacher since two years ago. Diana has done her homework.

Jawaban:

she has met him

Penjelasan:

s+have/has+v3, sorry if I'm wrong :)
